function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of technological infrastructure for internet connectivity","Impact":"Inability to support seamless communication of different devices","Mitigation":"Investment in technological infrastructure, expansion of internet penetration in developing economies","Technologies":"Telecommunication technologies, internet infrastructure, wireless communication technologies","People":"Citizens, businesses, government organizations","Owner":"Government, telecommunications companies, private corporations"},{"Description":"Reliance on private corporations for smart city development","Impact":"Definition and marketing of smart cities by private corporations, potential lack of public influence and control","Mitigation":"Collaboration between public and private sectors, government oversight and regulation of smart city development","Technologies":"Smart city technologies, digital infrastructure, government regulatory technologies","People":"Citizens, government organizations","Owner":"Government, private corporations"}]}
